attributes.action: introduce legislation to ensure that UK and foreign owned banks in the UK are not supported with UK taxpayer funds to the extent that the moral hazard element is increased exponentially, through the removal of ANY and ALL accountability and responsibility when already overpaid directors; chief executive officers and chairpersons of the banks don't do the job they are paid for and cause their bank to lose money.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
